PrecisAuthority (a) to enter into a SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the HURON-WENDAT NATION for the purpose of resolving a specific claim associated with the surrender in 1904 of its Quarante Arpents Reserve, and (b) to accept the absolute surrender set out in Article 3.1 thereof.
